DOC.brief_summary: This open label , single use , randomize , 4-period cross-over study . In period , subject receive one 4 test combination . Blood drawn prior study product consumption follow study product consumption glucose measure .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Psyllium Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: male 18 50 year age general good health Body Mass Index ( BMI ) range 18.529.9 kg/m2 fast plasma blood glucose < 126mg/dL actively treat high blood glucose willing able blood drawn multiple time 4 visit history allergy hypersensitivity inhale ingested psyllium meal ingredient Phenylketonuria ( PKU ) eat disorder follow special medical weightloss dietary restriction take dietary supplement prescription medication purpose weight loss/management
